item.title: GCP PDE Recipies
item.description: Intro This is a post in a series recording some notes as I’m studying for Google’s Professional Data Engineer Certification. In this post, I provide some common recipies which are commonly used in Google Cloud. Disclaimer The content of these posts is written before I have taken the exam. I do not guarantee the accuracy or long-term reliability of these notes. Use them at your own risk and always defer to Google’s docs as canon.
